description: This file defines FastAPI route handlers for synchronously interacting with agents, teams, and workflows, including streaming responses and file processing logic within a backend API for a multi-modal AI system.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of processing messages and maintaining state.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents or users collaborating within the system.

classes.name: Workflow
classes.description: Defines a workflow for orchestrating multiple steps or processes.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response from an agent's run method.

classes.name: RunResponseEvent
classes.description: Event wrapper for run responses, providing JSON serialization.

classes.name: TeamRunResponseEvent
classes.description: Event wrapper for team run responses, providing JSON serialization.

classes.name: RunResponseErrorEvent
classes.description: Event indicating an error occurred during a run.

methods.name: agent_chat_response_streamer
methods.description: Streams the response from an agent as a generator, handling exceptions.

methods.name: team_chat_response_streamer
methods.description: Streams the response from a team as a generator, handling exceptions.

methods.name: get_sync_router
methods.description: Creates and returns a FastAPI APIRouter with endpoints for status and running agents, teams, or workflows, including file processing and streaming responses.
